title: Bytheway Dance
synopsis: A full version of the theme song Bytheway Dance from the Inazma Delivery franchise posted on the official YouTube channel. Previously only a few seconds of the song and dance were used as the OP of Tutorial no Toku Dane Fuku Kitaru♪, the music variety program that the Inazma Delivery anime aired within. The posting was made in honor of the 2nd season completing its televised airing.
